name: Wanda
text: On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Minks) type card other than [Wanda] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Minks) type card other than [Wanda] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
